input.sentences: this is one of the most interesting cities we ever visited . there was a lot of arches like this one .
and random street musicians playing classical instruments .
there were bright | yellow flowers everywhere .
and beautiful homes on the water .

output.sentences: In Italy we visited a lot of cities.
In the street we ran into random kids playing music.
I have never seen yellow flowers shine so bright.
The water front homes were so beautiful.
You dont want to miss these sea faring cities.
